data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 4, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Recife PE throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Recife PE pushes forward through Patric, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 5, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Ilha do Retiro.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 8, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 11, Fluminense drive forward but Luiz Henrique is judged offside.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Recife PE.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Hernane Brocador.
In the minute 14, Recife PE needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
Recife PE drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, Attention is being given to Fluminense’s Hudson and play has been suspended briefly.
Recife PE are pushing forward but Lucas Mugni's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 17, Fluminense's Hudson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense's Ganso gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 21, Recife PE's Leandro Barcia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Recife PE's area.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 28, At Ilha do Retiro, Andre has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Recife PE's Betinho misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 36, Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Recife PE.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 39, Fluminense are caught offside.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Fluminense.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Recife PE throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 41, In Recife Recife PE drive forward through Ricardinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Leandro Barcia (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 44, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Throw-in Fluminense.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Recife.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 46, Fluminense are coming forward and Luiz Henrique gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Felippe Cardoso is replacing Andre for Fluminense at Ilha do Retiro.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Betinho (Recife PE) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Recife PE drive upfield and Hernane Brocador gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
In the minute 50, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Fluminense's Wellington Silva breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 51, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Wellington Silva (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a first substitution, with Rogerio replacing Hernane Brocador.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fluminense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Recife PE throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE's Leandro Barcia has run offside.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luiz Henrique of Fluminense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Recife PE push upfield but Leandro Pedro Vuaden quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 69, Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Recife.
Fluminense's Yago Felipe gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wellington Silva (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Recife PE defenders.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Lucas Mugni with Bruninho. This is the second substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Daniel Paulista is making the team's third substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Lucas Venuto replacing Leandro Barcia.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Fluminense make their second substitution with Miguel replacing Luiz Henrique.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Recife PE.
Fluminense drive upfield and Wellington Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 78, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Paulista is making the team's fourth substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Joao Igor replacing Betinho.
Chico is on a sub for Luciano for Recife PE.
In the minute 79, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Fluminense push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Yago Felipe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Nino (Fluminense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Leandro Pedro Vuaden waits before resuming play because Luan Polli for Recife PE is still down.
Recife PE’s Luan Polli is on his feet again at Ilha do Retiro.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense just outside Recife PE's area.
In the minute 83, Ganso for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Recife PE a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Marcos Paulo is replacing Yago Felipe for the away team.
The away team have replaced Wellington Silva with Fernando Pacheco. This is the fourth substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Marcos Paulo for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Calegari gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 89, Fluminense drives forward and Egidio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Fluminense throw-in in Recife PE's half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Fluminense's Marcos Paulo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Recife PE.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Fluminense's area.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
